medical_history.chief_complaint: Congenital mitral stenosis associated with coarctation of the aorta.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was referred for fetal echocardiography at 25 weeks' gestation. Echocardiographic examination revealed limited mobility of the mitral valve leaflets and coarctation of the aorta. The parents decided to terminate the pregnancy at 30 weeks' gestation due to high surgical risks and difficulties associated with reoperation.
